products.title: Peeragogy Handbook 1.3.1
products.blurb: Foundational collection of peer learning techniques; early collaborative edition.

products.title: Peeragogy Handbook 2.01
products.blurb: Expanded with case studies, design patterns, and peer-produced resources.

products.title: Peeragogy Handbook 3.0
products.blurb: Most comprehensive edition, includes a workbook, refined pattern catalog, and improved design.

products.title: ENG 099 Conversational American English Textbook
products.blurb: A practical ESL resource with dialogues, activities, and assessment ideas.

products.title: The Uncertainty Principle, Issue 4: Reality
products.blurb: Literary experiments, fiction, and reflections on truth and perception.

products.title: The Uncertainty Principle, Issue 5: Snoozing i$$ue
products.blurb: Poetry, fiction, and an essay on Open Education. Published in Chicago by #daLabPress.

products.title: Lending a Hand in Bringing Ballcarriers Down
products.blurb: NFL Big Data Bowl research quantifying teamwork in tackling using Next Gen Stats.

products.title: Peeragogy Starter Pack
products.blurb: Get all three Peeragogy Handbooks (1.3.1, 2.01, and 3.0) together as a discounted set.

products.title: Peeragogy Complete Set
products.blurb: All three Peeragogy Handbooks collected in one package—the complete evolution of peer learning resources.

products.title: Zines + Teaching Pack
products.blurb: Two Uncertainty Principle issues plus ENG 099—bridging literature, experimentation, and classroom use.
includes: The Uncertainty Principle, Issue 5: Snoozing i$$ue

products.title: Uncertainty Principle Double Pack
products.blurb: Issues 4 and 5 of daLab’s experimental zine—truth, perception, and Open Education.
includes: The Uncertainty Principle, Issue 5: Snoozing i$$ue

products.title: Peeragogy 3.0 + Ballcarriers Research Pack
products.blurb: Peeragogy 3.0 for collaborative learning + the NFL Big Data Bowl paper on teamwork in tackling.
includes: Lending a Hand in Bringing Ballcarriers Down
